activities.loc: Branch 3 - Hearing by Zoom.  See enclosed information.

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jonathan C Burgess

records.addlTxt: Plea/sentencing hearing on January 5, 2023 at 11:00 am.

[MK; Appearances are by Zoom Conference] 
case called at 9:37am 
Defendant Jonathan C Burgess appears. Attorney Eric Caudill appears.  DA  Monica Hall appears for the State of Wisconsin.
Attorney Caudill indicates that the parties are working toward finalizing an agreement in the case; the scheduling of a plea and sentencing is requested. Appearances by Zoom are requested because the Defendant resides in Florida. Attorney Caudill verifies that Mr. Burgess understands he has the right to be present in the courtroom for sentencing. 
The Court informs counsel that this case will likely be administratively transferred to a new judge on January 1st. The Court directs Attorney Caudill to counsel the Defendant regarding his rights in relation to this. 
recess 9:40am  

NEXT:  Plea and Sentencing on January 5th at 11:00am with appearances by Zoom
Zoom OK

[ae] case called 08:35 AM Defendant Jonathan C Burgess in court with attorney Eric James Caudill. ADA Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.

The Court finds probable cause to exist in the Criminal Complaint.

The Court requires $2500 Signature Bond, with conditions:

--no acts or threats of violence towards any person
--Defendant is to report to the Jefferson County Sheriff's Office for booking (fingerprints and photographs)
